mapper.select: select * from post_ order by num desc limit #{startIndex}, 7
select count(*) as count from post_
mapper.insert: INSERT into post_ (tag, w_id, w_nickname, title, content) values(#{tag}, #{w_id},#{w_nickname}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: update post_ set view_count = view_count + 1 where num = #{num}
